Package library.joints

Class Joint

java.lang.Object
library.joints.Joint
Direct Known Subclasses:
JointToBody, JointToPoint
public abstract class Joint
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract class for joints holding all the common properties of joints.

  • Constructor Details

    • Joint

      protected Joint​(Body b1, double jointLength, double jointConstant, double dampening, boolean canGoSlack, Vectors2D offset1)
      Default constructor
      Parameters:
      b1 - A body the joint is attached to
      jointLength - The desired distance of the joint between two points/bodies
      jointConstant - The strength of the joint
      dampening - The dampening constant to use for the joints forces
      canGoSlack - Boolean whether the joint can go slack or not
      offset1 - Offset to be applied to the location of the joint relative to b1's object space.

  • Method Details

    • applyTension

      public abstract void applyTension()
      Abstract method to apply tension to the joint

    • calculateTension

      public abstract double calculateTension()
      Abstract method to calculate tension between the joint
      Returns:
      double value of the tension force between two points/bodies

    • rateOfChangeOfExtension

      public abstract double rateOfChangeOfExtension()
      Determines the rate of change between two objects/points.
      Returns:
      double value of the rate of change

    • draw

      public abstract void draw​(java.awt.Graphics2D g, testbed.ColourSettings paintSettings, testbed.Camera camera)
      Abstract draw method using graphics2D from java.swing for debug drawer.
      Parameters:
      g - Graphics2D object to draw to
      paintSettings - Colour settings to draw the objects to screen with
      camera - Camera class used to convert points from world space to view space
